trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: Der Automatisierungspeer für die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />-Klasse, die die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />-Klasse enthält.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> class.

Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Steuerelementtyp für das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Namen des <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Ein Enumerationswert, der den Befehlstyp angibt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft das Steuerelementmuster für das <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> ab, das diesem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /><see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ein Objekt, von dem das Steuerelementmuster unterstützt wird, wenn <paramref name="patternInterface" /> die Werte <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /><see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> oder <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> hat, andernfalls <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Verschiebt die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> per Bildlauf in den sichtbaren Bereich des Containers.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmemberimplementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.
